title: How to unsubscribe from SWEET.TV
description: Learn how to cancel your SWEET.TV subscription. The process varies depending on how you signed up (website, Google Play, or Apple App Store). SWEET.TV subscriptions are commitment-free and can be cancelled at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing cycle.

steps_1.title: Cancel via Website
steps_1.description:
If you signed up on the website, you can cancel your subscription by logging into your account on the SWEET.TV website and following these steps:

*   Navigate to the settings menu in the top right corner of the screen by clicking on your avatar.
*   Choose an option and then select Continue. 
*   To finalize the cancellation, select Confirm Cancellation.

steps_2.title: Cancel via Google Play Store
steps_2.description:
If you subscribed through Google Play, cancel as follows:

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Tap 'Payments & subscriptions', then 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select SWEET.TV to cancel.

steps_3.title: Cancel via Apple App Store
steps_3.description:
If you subscribed through the Apple App Store, cancel as follows:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select SWEET.TV to cancel.

seo_text: Cancel SWEET.TV subscription, unsubscribe from SWEET.TV, SWEET.TV cancellation, end SWEET.TV subscription, manage SWEET.TV subscription, Google Play SWEET.TV cancellation, Apple App Store SWEET.TV cancellation
